p: The time horizon for which predictions are generally offered is in the order of 2 to 4 weeks, which is generally too short for action [ 11]. Because of the time-consuming nature of vaccine production, vaccine strategy needs to be prepared at least six months in advance of the upcoming flu season [ 12]. The optimal strategy for any country is to use the most recently available vaccine formulation with respect to local peak influenza timing, as long as the vaccine is available at least two months prior to the peak (early October for the Northern Hemisphere formulation) [ 13].
